titleStmt.title: The confession, obstinacy, and ignorance, of Father Bell, a Romish priest. Wherein is declared, the manner of his tryall, condemnation, and execution, on Munday Decemb. 11. 1643. Together with the names of those that suffered for stealing the ambassadours plate; and the names and facts of others who were executed at Tiburne the same day.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Bates, and are to be sold at his shop in the Old-Baily.,

notesStmt.note: Includes first page of Wing 4269 : The Kingdomes manifestation / John Pym.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
